extendedInfo.description: This app is designed to help you with creating your first website. How many people offer web design information for FREE?? Well with Chris Farrell and Zayne Thompson at your side, it will be a walk in the park in order to learn these new skills. Not only that, you will also recieve all the information you need in order to start building a business online! All for Free! Make sure not to miss this one while the app is free, it may be paid in the future.

reviews.title: Bogus
reviews.comment: This app asks for you to sign up by email and then they just flood your email with offers for a paid membership.  End result,  no website
reviews.author: Robert F
